name: Autumn Leaves (itch) (Yamakoshi Hiroyuki)
description:
An artsy, text-based, city builder.

Build a town and protect it for 90 days as you learn about the world, it's characters and the mess you just got yourself into.

Features:

  • Build a town from scratch.
  • Protect it from raiders and enemy factions.
  • Meet an eccentric cast of characters and watch them grow.
  • Harvest and process resources, upgrade buildings and technology, etc.
  • Original art and soundtrack; Created by one person.

Please don't let the screenshots intimidate you, the game is much simpler than it looks.

The game is updated whenever I feel inspired to, please feel free to DM me in case you find any bugs :

https://twitter.com/HeroWasTaken
